function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Segregation of population under SIR transmission scheme","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spreading due to localized transmission of the disease within specific population groups","Mitigation":"Implement measures to promote integration and interaction between different population groups to reduce the localized transmission of diseases","Technologies":"Social integration programs, community engagement initiatives","People":"Segregated population groups","Owner":"Community leaders, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Heterogeneous contact networks through which diseases are spread","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease transmission in areas with diverse contact networks","Mitigation":"Implement targeted intervention strategies in areas with diverse contact networks to reduce disease transmission","Technologies":"Targeted vaccination campaigns, contact tracing technologies","People":"Population in areas with diverse contact networks","Owner":"Public health authorities, local government"},{"Description":"Expected number of SI contacts occurring at specific locations","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission at locations with high expected SI contacts","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce contact density at specific locations through crowd control and spatial distancing strategies","Technologies":"Crowd monitoring technologies, spatial planning and zoning regulations","People":"Individuals visiting or residing at locations with high expected SI contacts","Owner":"Government authorities, venue operators"}]}
